shortInfo: A thrilling quiz competition to test your knowledge.
about: QUIZAHOLIC is a battle of wits where participants answer challenging questions from various domains, including science, history, and general knowledge.

shortInfo: An obstacle race to test speed and agility.
about: HURDLE HUSTLE is an adrenaline-pumping event where participants navigate through hurdles, showcasing their endurance and athleticism.

shortInfo: A robotics-based competition focused on thrust power.
about: THRUST ARENA challenges teams to design robots with maximum thrust efficiency to complete predefined tasks.
In PATH FOLLOWER, robots must navigate a designated track accurately using sensors and programmed intelligence.

shortInfo: A race event on a sandy terrain.
about: SAND SURFER challenges participants to drive or maneuver vehicles efficiently on rough, sandy surfaces.

shortInfo: A battle of strategy and skill.
about: VICTORY ARENA is a competition where participants showcase their strategic thinking and skills in various challenges.

shortInfo: A marketplace competition for the best stall setup.
about: STALL SHOWDOWN is an entrepreneurial event where participants set up creative and engaging stalls to attract visitors.

shortInfo: A pitch competition for innovative business ideas.
about: STARTUP IDEA provides a platform for budding entrepreneurs to present their groundbreaking business concepts to investors and judges.

shortInfo: A robot that can function on both land and water.
about: AMPHIBIOUS ROBOT challenges teams to design and build robots capable of navigating both terrestrial and aquatic environments.
ARMSTRONG is a physical endurance event where participants showcase their power and stamina in various strength-based tasks.

shortInfo: An engineering event focused on structural designs.
about: TRUSS ARCH challenges participants to design and build the most efficient and sturdy truss structures.
ROBO RALLY is a robotics event where participants race their self-built robots on a challenging track.

shortInfo: A coding event focused on debugging skills.
about: DEBUG DYNMO is a challenge where programmers must identify and fix bugs in code within a time limit.
INTERFACE INSIDER challenges designers to create intuitive and engaging user interfaces.
CADION is an event where participants showcase their Computer-Aided Design (CAD) skills.
THE GOLDEN QUEST is an adventurous hunt where participants solve clues to find hidden treasures.
ROBO KICKOFF is an event where participants build and control robots to compete in a soccer match.
